mapper.select: SELECT dtPassTime AS dtPassTime , iLane AS iLane , iTotalWeight AS iTotalWeight , szVehicleLicense AS szVehicleLicense, sgx_pic_data.id AS id, pic_bin AS picBin from( SELECT [dtPassTime] ,[iLane] ,[iTotalWeight] ,[szVehicleLicense] FROM [WOpenFerry].[dbo].[ta_StationData] WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(100),[WOpenFerry].[dbo].[ta_StationData].[dtPassTime],112) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(100),GETDATE(),112) ) as tmp join [WOpenFerry].[dbo].[sgx_pic_data] as sgx_pic_data on tmp.szVehicleLicense = sgx_pic_data.szVehicleLicenseFromName AND sgx_pic_data.isSended = 0 AND iTotalWeight > #{limitWeight};
